casebody.data:
ALLEN ET AL. v. SHURTS. On Certiorari. Mr. Wilson for the plaintiff in Certiorari,

moves for a rule to stay an execution for costs, which has been issued by the Insolvent, on the verdict recorded in his favor, in the Court of Common Pleas, which verdict is to be removed into this Court, ly the writ of Certiorari.

By the Court.

The defendant in Gertiorari being confes*222sedly an Insolvent, and therefore unable to make restitution, in case the verdict and proceedings should be reversed; let a rule be entered, staying proceedings on the execution, until the further order of this court.

Rule granted.
